entry.title: 14" Round Brushed Nickel Dimmable Flush Mount; Single Ring; 1750 Lumens ; Power: 25W ; 3 Color Switchable (3000K/4000K/5000K)
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: Flushmount
Price: 68.23 - 257.32 (2 variants)

LED Flush Mount Ceiling Lights are the modern lightings that are perfect for close-to-ceiling lightings. It provides a warm touch to the place and creates a soothing ambiance. The energy-efficient lighting of 25W replaces HPS lights, HID metal-halides, and halogen lamps of 90 watts. By delivering the high-lumen output of 1750 lumens, they are available in three categories: Single Ring, Double Ring, and Mushroom. LED Flush Mount Ceiling Lights are flicker-free and are easily installable. It comes with a lifespan of 50,000 hours and is rebate eligible. It's a UL and Energy Star certified light fixture that is IP20 rated with a manufacturer warranty of 5-years. This wall-pack lighting fixture is a complete lighting fixture in itself that is practical, durable, and eco-friendly.
